title: scrollback: thread 'pty reader' panicked at 'attempt to subtract with overflow', src/index.rs:168:28
body:
alacritty @ scrollback , 8e8ecdd, debug build 


````
RUST_BACKTRACE=full target/debug/alacritty  -vvvvvvvvvvvvvv
````

in the new debug alacritty window:
````
cat /dev/urandom
[prints random chars]
wait until crash
````
